**Uber Driver Prediction Dashboard**

## Review Sentiment App {#Sentiment-app}

**Airbnb Sentiment Application & Hosting Strategy**  
Developed a sentiment analysis app for Airbnb hosts using NLP and XGBoost. The app predicts whether a review is positive or negative, visualizes key terms through word clouds, and allows users to flag incorrect predictions. These user-labeled responses are designed to support future supervised model retraining for improved accuracy and adaptability.

<a href="/projects/project-airbnb.html" class="btn">Read More</a>

<img src="../images/airbnb-cover.png">
:::

## Anemia Prediction {#anemia-ml}

**Predicting Anemia with Machine Learning**  
Developed classification models using blood test data to predict anemia, focusing on early detection support. Leveraged feature selection techniques to identify the most relevant clinical indicators and applied SMOTE to address class imbalance. Models such as Decision Trees and Logistic Regression were used to explore interpretability and predictive performance.

<a href="/projects/project-anemia.html" class="btn">Read More</a>

<img src="../images/anemia-cover.jpg">
:::

::: {.project-card-page}
## Obesity Risk Analysis {#obesity-risk}

**Obesity Risk Analysis and Behavioral Clustering**  
Conducted a comprehensive analysis of obesity risk using classification models, clustering techniques, and ANOVA. Explored lifestyle and dietary factors to uncover patterns linked to obesity. After segmenting individuals into behavioral clusters, we provided tailored recommendations for each group to support targeted public health interventions.

<a href="/projects/project-obesity.html" class="btn">Read More</a>
